name: Reception For Hospitals
sub: An application that is based on MERN
about: Technologies used: HTML ,CSS, JavaScript, React js, Node js, Mongodb, Chakra UI.
In this project, I created some forms and the data of them are received by a server and stored in the MongoDB database and the data is received from the database and rendered on the page
Filter based on the field of specialization
Filter that checks if the Doctor is free on that particular date.
